recipes.name: Vegetable Stir Fry
recipes.description: Quick and healthy stir fry with colorful vegetables
instructions: Heat sesame oil in a large pan or wok over high heat
Add minced garlic and ginger, stir for 30 seconds until fragrant
Add broccoli and carrots, stir-fry for 3 minutes
Add bell pepper and continue cooking for 2-3 minutes
Add soy sauce and toss everything together for 2 more minutes
Serve hot over rice or noodles

recipes.name: Classic Spaghetti Carbonara
recipes.description: Creamy Italian pasta with eggs and bacon
instructions: Cook spaghetti in salted boiling water according to package instructions
While pasta cooks, fry bacon until crispy, then chop into small pieces
In a bowl, whisk together eggs, grated parmesan, and black pepper
Drain pasta, reserving 1 cup of pasta water
Add hot pasta to the bacon pan, remove from heat
Quickly stir in egg mixture, adding pasta water to create a creamy sauce
Serve immediately with extra parmesan

recipes.name: Quinoa Buddha Bowl
recipes.description: Nutritious bowl with quinoa, roasted vegetables, and tahini dressing
instructions: Cook quinoa according to package instructions
Cube sweet potato and roast with olive oil at 200°C for 25 minutes
Roast chickpeas with spices until crispy
Massage kale with a bit of olive oil and lemon juice
Mix tahini with lemon juice and water to make dressing
Assemble bowl with quinoa, roasted vegetables, chickpeas, and kale
Drizzle with tahini dressing

recipes.name: Chicken Tikka Masala
recipes.description: Creamy Indian curry with tender chicken pieces
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and half the spices for 30 minutes
Grill or pan-fry chicken until cooked, then cut into pieces
Sauté onions, garlic, and ginger until soft
Add remaining spices and cook for 1 minute
Add tomato sauce and simmer for 10 minutes
Stir in cream and cooked chicken, simmer for 10 more minutes
Serve with rice or naan bread

recipes.name: Greek Salad
recipes.description: Fresh Mediterranean salad with feta and olives
instructions: Chop tomatoes, cucumber, and onion into bite-sized pieces
Place vegetables in a large bowl
Add olives and crumbled feta cheese
Drizzle with olive oil and lemon juice
Sprinkle with oregano and salt
Toss gently and serve immediately

recipes.name: Lentil Soup
recipes.description: Hearty and warming soup packed with protein
instructions: Heat olive oil in a large pot
Sauté chopped onion, carrot, celery, and garlic until soft
Add cumin and cook for 1 minute
Add lentils and vegetable broth
Bring to a boil, then reduce heat and simmer for 30 minutes
Blend partially for a creamy texture if desired
Season with salt and pepper, serve hot

recipes.name: Beef Tacos
recipes.description: Mexican-style tacos with seasoned ground beef
instructions: Brown ground beef in a pan over medium heat
Add taco seasoning and a splash of water, simmer for 5 minutes
Warm taco shells according to package instructions
Chop lettuce and dice tomatoes
Grate cheese if needed
Fill taco shells with beef, lettuce, tomato, cheese
Top with sour cream and serve

recipes.name: Mushroom Risotto
recipes.description: Creamy Italian rice dish with mushrooms
instructions: Slice mushrooms and sauté in butter until golden, set aside
In the same pan, sauté chopped onion and garlic until soft
Add rice and stir for 2 minutes until translucent
Add white wine and stir until absorbed
Add hot broth one ladle at a time, stirring constantly
Continue until rice is creamy and al dente (about 20 minutes)
Stir in mushrooms, parmesan, and butter, serve immediately

recipes.name: Caesar Salad
recipes.description: Classic salad with romaine lettuce and parmesan
instructions: Grill or pan-fry chicken breast, then slice
Wash and chop romaine lettuce
Make dressing: blend mayonnaise, lemon juice, garlic, and anchovies
Toss lettuce with dressing
Add croutons and shaved parmesan
Top with sliced chicken
Serve immediately

recipes.name: Pad Thai
recipes.description: Classic Thai stir-fried noodles with peanuts
instructions: Soak rice noodles in warm water for 30 minutes, drain
Mix fish sauce, tamarind paste, and sugar for sauce
Heat oil in wok, scramble eggs, set aside
Stir-fry shrimp until pink, set aside
Add noodles and sauce to wok, toss for 2-3 minutes
Add shrimp, eggs, bean sprouts, and peanuts
Serve with lime wedges

recipes.name: Caprese Salad
recipes.description: Simple Italian salad with tomato, mozzarella, and basil
instructions: Slice tomatoes and mozzarella into rounds
Arrange alternating slices on a plate
Tuck fresh basil leaves between slices
Drizzle with olive oil and balsamic vinegar
Sprinkle with salt and pepper
Serve at room temperature

recipes.name: Chickpea Curry
recipes.description: Flavorful Indian curry with chickpeas and tomatoes
instructions: Sauté onion, garlic, and ginger until soft
Add curry powder and cook for 1 minute
Add chopped tomatoes and cook for 5 minutes
Add chickpeas and coconut milk
Simmer for 15 minutes
Stir in spinach until wilted
Serve with rice or naan

recipes.name: French Onion Soup
recipes.description: Classic soup with caramelized onions and cheese
instructions: Thinly slice onions
Melt butter in a large pot and add onions
Cook onions slowly for 40 minutes until caramelized
Add wine and cook for 2 minutes
Add broth and thyme, simmer for 20 minutes
Toast baguette slices, top with cheese
Pour soup into bowls, top with cheese toasts, broil until melted

recipes.name: Salmon Teriyaki
recipes.description: Glazed salmon with sweet and savory Japanese sauce
instructions: Mix soy sauce, honey, vinegar, ginger, and garlic for sauce
Cut salmon into portions
Heat pan with oil over medium-high heat
Sear salmon skin-side down for 4 minutes
Flip and cook for 3 more minutes
Pour sauce over salmon and cook for 2 minutes until glazed
Sprinkle with sesame seeds and serve

recipes.name: Vegetable Lasagna
recipes.description: Layered pasta bake with vegetables and cheese
instructions: Slice zucchini and eggplant, roast until tender
Mix ricotta with egg and half the parmesan
Spread sauce in baking dish, layer with lasagna sheets
Add ricotta mixture, vegetables, and mozzarella
Repeat layers, ending with sauce and cheese
Cover with foil, bake at 180°C for 30 minutes
Remove foil, bake 15 more minutes until golden

recipes.name: Black Bean Burgers
recipes.description: Hearty vegetarian burgers with black beans
instructions: Mash black beans in a bowl, leaving some chunks
Add finely chopped onion, breadcrumbs, egg, and cumin
Mix well and form into 4 patties
Refrigerate for 30 minutes to firm up
Pan-fry or grill patties for 5 minutes per side
Toast burger buns
Assemble burgers with lettuce, tomato, and your favorite toppings

recipes.name: Tomato Basil Soup
recipes.description: Creamy tomato soup with fresh basil
instructions: Sauté chopped onion and garlic in olive oil until soft
Add chopped tomatoes and cook for 10 minutes
Add vegetable broth and simmer for 15 minutes
Blend soup until smooth
Stir in cream and fresh basil
Season with salt and pepper
Serve hot with crusty bread

recipes.name: Shrimp Scampi
recipes.description: Garlic butter shrimp with white wine and lemon
instructions: Cook spaghetti according to package instructions
Melt butter in a large pan over medium heat
Add minced garlic and red pepper flakes, cook for 1 minute
Add shrimp and cook for 2-3 minutes per side
Add white wine and lemon juice, simmer for 2 minutes
Toss cooked pasta with shrimp and sauce
Garnish with parsley and serve

recipes.name: Vegetable Fried Rice
recipes.description: Quick Asian-style rice with mixed vegetables
instructions: Use day-old cold rice for best results
Heat sesame oil in a large wok or pan
Add minced garlic and diced carrot, stir-fry for 2 minutes
Add peas and corn, cook for 2 minutes
Add rice, breaking up clumps, and stir-fry for 3 minutes
Add soy sauce and mix well
Garnish with chopped green onions and serve

recipes.name: Margherita Pizza
recipes.description: Classic Italian pizza with tomato, mozzarella, and basil
instructions: Let pizza dough come to room temperature for 1 hour
Preheat oven to maximum temperature (250°C or higher)
Roll out dough into a circle
Spread tomato sauce evenly, leaving a border
Tear mozzarella and distribute over sauce
Drizzle with olive oil
Bake for 10-15 minutes until crust is golden and cheese is bubbly
Add fresh basil leaves before serving

recipes.name: Chicken Caesar Wrap
recipes.description: Quick lunch wrap with chicken and Caesar dressing
instructions: Grill or pan-fry chicken breast, slice into strips
Chop romaine lettuce
Warm tortilla wraps slightly
Spread Caesar dressing on wraps
Add lettuce, chicken strips, parmesan, and croutons
Roll up tightly, cut in half diagonally
Serve immediately

recipes.name: Minestrone Soup
recipes.description: Italian vegetable soup with pasta and beans
instructions: Dice all vegetables into small pieces
Sauté onion, carrot, and celery in olive oil for 5 minutes
Add garlic and cook for 1 minute
Add tomatoes, broth, and beans
Bring to a boil, then simmer for 20 minutes
Add zucchini and pasta, cook for 10 more minutes
Season with salt, pepper, and Italian herbs, serve hot

recipes.name: Grilled Cheese Sandwich
recipes.description: Classic comfort food with melted cheese
instructions: Butter one side of each bread slice
Place cheese between two slices, buttered sides out
Heat a pan over medium heat
Cook sandwich for 3-4 minutes per side until golden
Press down gently with a spatula
Remove when cheese is melted and bread is crispy
Cut diagonally and serve hot

recipes.name: Beef Stir Fry with Broccoli
recipes.description: Quick Asian-style beef with vegetables
instructions: Slice beef thinly against the grain
Marinate beef with soy sauce and cornstarch for 10 minutes
Heat wok or large pan with oil over high heat
Stir-fry beef until browned, remove and set aside
Add broccoli and bell pepper, stir-fry for 3-4 minutes
Add garlic and ginger, cook for 1 minute
Return beef to pan with oyster sauce, toss for 2 minutes
Serve over rice

recipes.name: Hummus
recipes.description: Creamy Middle Eastern chickpea dip
instructions: Drain chickpeas, reserving some liquid
Add chickpeas, tahini, lemon juice, garlic, and cumin to food processor
Blend until smooth, adding chickpea liquid for desired consistency
Add olive oil and blend again
Season with salt to taste
Transfer to a bowl, drizzle with olive oil
Serve with pita bread or vegetables

recipes.name: Pancakes
recipes.description: Fluffy breakfast pancakes
instructions: Mix flour, sugar, and baking powder in a bowl
In another bowl, whisk eggs, milk, melted butter, and vanilla
Pour wet ingredients into dry ingredients, mix until just combined
Let batter rest for 5 minutes
Heat a non-stick pan over medium heat
Pour batter to form pancakes, cook until bubbles form
Flip and cook for 1-2 more minutes
Serve with maple syrup and toppings

recipes.name: Falafel
recipes.description: Crispy Middle Eastern chickpea fritters
instructions: Use dried chickpeas soaked overnight, not canned
Drain chickpeas and add to food processor with onion, garlic, herbs
Pulse until finely ground but not a paste
Mix in flour, cumin, salt, and baking powder
Refrigerate mixture for 1 hour
Form into small balls or patties
Deep fry at 180°C for 3-4 minutes until golden
Serve in pita with tahini sauce and vegetables

recipes.name: Pesto Pasta
recipes.description: Fresh pasta with basil pesto sauce
instructions: Toast pine nuts in a dry pan until golden
Blend basil, pine nuts, garlic, and parmesan in food processor
Slowly add olive oil while blending until smooth
Add lemon juice and season with salt
Cook pasta according to package instructions
Reserve some pasta water before draining
Toss pasta with pesto, adding pasta water to loosen if needed
Serve with extra parmesan

recipes.name: Sweet Potato Curry
recipes.description: Creamy curry with sweet potato and coconut milk
instructions: Peel and cube sweet potatoes
Sauté onion, garlic, and ginger until soft
Add curry powder and tomato paste, cook for 1 minute
Add sweet potato and coconut milk
Simmer for 20 minutes until sweet potato is tender
Stir in spinach until wilted
Season with salt and serve with rice or naan

recipes.name: Chicken Quesadilla
recipes.description: Cheesy Mexican tortilla with chicken
instructions: Cook and dice chicken, season with taco seasoning
Sauté bell pepper and onion until soft
Grate cheese
Place tortilla in hot pan, sprinkle with cheese
Add chicken and vegetables on half the tortilla
Fold in half and cook for 2-3 minutes per side until crispy
Cut into wedges and serve with sour cream

recipes.name: Ratatouille
recipes.description: French vegetable stew with herbs
instructions: Dice all vegetables into similar-sized pieces
Sauté onion and garlic in olive oil until soft
Add eggplant and cook for 5 minutes
Add zucchini and bell peppers, cook for 5 minutes
Add tomatoes, thyme, salt, and pepper
Simmer covered for 30 minutes, stirring occasionally
Stir in fresh basil before serving
Serve hot or at room temperature

recipes.name: Egg Fried Rice
recipes.description: Simple fried rice with scrambled eggs
instructions: Use cold day-old rice for best results
Beat eggs and scramble in hot pan, set aside
Heat sesame oil in wok, add minced garlic
Add rice, breaking up clumps, stir-fry for 3 minutes
Add peas and cook for 2 minutes
Add soy sauce and scrambled eggs, mix well
Garnish with chopped green onions and serve

recipes.name: Fish Tacos
recipes.description: Crispy fish tacos with fresh toppings
instructions: Cut fish into strips, coat with seasoned flour
Fry fish until crispy and golden, about 3 minutes per side
Mix mayonnaise with lime juice for sauce
Shred cabbage thinly
Warm tortillas in a dry pan
Assemble tacos with fish, cabbage, sauce, and cilantro
Serve with lime wedges

recipes.name: Butternut Squash Soup
recipes.description: Creamy and comforting autumn soup
instructions: Peel and cube butternut squash
Sauté onion and garlic in olive oil until soft
Add squash and cook for 5 minutes
Add vegetable broth and bring to a boil
Simmer for 25 minutes until squash is tender
Blend soup until smooth
Stir in coconut milk and nutmeg, season with salt
Serve hot with a drizzle of coconut milk

recipes.name: Chili Con Carne
recipes.description: Hearty beef and bean chili
instructions: Brown ground beef in a large pot, drain excess fat
Add chopped onion, bell pepper, and garlic, cook for 5 minutes
Add chili powder and cumin, stir for 1 minute
Add tomatoes, beans, and broth
Bring to a boil, then reduce heat and simmer for 30 minutes
Season with salt and pepper
Serve with rice, sour cream, and cheese

recipes.name: Tofu Scramble
recipes.description: Vegan alternative to scrambled eggs
instructions: Drain and crumble tofu into small pieces
Heat olive oil in a pan
Sauté chopped onion and bell pepper until soft
Add crumbled tofu and turmeric, cook for 5 minutes
Add nutritional yeast and garlic powder
Season with salt and pepper
Serve hot with toast or in a breakfast burrito

recipes.name: Shepherd's Pie
recipes.description: Comforting meat and potato casserole
instructions: Boil potatoes until tender, mash with butter and milk
Brown ground lamb with chopped onion
Add diced carrots, peas, tomato paste, and broth
Simmer for 15 minutes
Transfer meat mixture to baking dish
Spread mashed potatoes on top
Bake at 200°C for 25 minutes until golden
Let rest for 5 minutes before serving

recipes.name: Gazpacho
recipes.description: Refreshing cold Spanish tomato soup
instructions: Roughly chop all vegetables
Soak bread in water, squeeze out excess
Blend tomatoes, cucumber, bell pepper, onion, and garlic
Add soaked bread, olive oil, and vinegar
Blend until smooth
Season with salt and pepper
Refrigerate for at least 2 hours
Serve cold with diced vegetables on top

recipes.name: Baked Salmon
recipes.description: Simple oven-baked salmon with herbs
instructions: Preheat oven to 200°C
Place salmon on a baking sheet lined with parchment
Drizzle with olive oil
Top with minced garlic, dill, salt, and pepper
Add lemon slices on top
Bake for 12-15 minutes until cooked through
Serve with vegetables or salad

recipes.name: Veggie Burger
recipes.description: Homemade vegetable and grain patties
instructions: Cook quinoa according to package instructions
Mash black beans in a bowl
Grate carrot and finely chop onion
Mix quinoa, beans, vegetables, breadcrumbs, and spices
Form into 4 patties, refrigerate for 30 minutes
Pan-fry or grill for 5 minutes per side
Serve on buns with your favorite toppings

recipes.name: Spaghetti Aglio e Olio
recipes.description: Simple Italian pasta with garlic and olive oil
instructions: Cook spaghetti in salted boiling water until al dente
While pasta cooks, heat olive oil in a large pan
Add thinly sliced garlic and red pepper flakes
Cook garlic gently for 2-3 minutes until golden (not brown)
Reserve pasta water, drain pasta
Add pasta to garlic oil with some pasta water
Toss well, add parsley and lemon zest
Serve immediately

recipes.name: Chicken Noodle Soup
recipes.description: Classic comforting soup with chicken and vegetables
instructions: Dice chicken into bite-sized pieces
Sauté onion, carrot, and celery in a large pot for 5 minutes
Add garlic and cook for 1 minute
Add chicken broth and thyme, bring to a boil
Add chicken and simmer for 15 minutes
Add egg noodles and cook for 8-10 minutes
Season with salt and pepper
Serve hot with fresh parsley

recipes.name: Stuffed Bell Peppers
recipes.description: Bell peppers filled with rice and vegetables
instructions: Cook rice according to package instructions
Cut tops off bell peppers and remove seeds
Sauté chopped onion and zucchini
Mix cooked rice with vegetables, diced tomatoes, oregano, and half the feta
Stuff peppers with rice mixture
Place in baking dish, drizzle with olive oil
Bake at 180°C for 35 minutes
Top with remaining feta and serve

recipes.name: Thai Green Curry
recipes.description: Creamy coconut curry with vegetables
instructions: Heat 2 tbsp coconut milk in a pot
Add curry paste and fry for 2 minutes
Add remaining coconut milk and bring to a simmer
Add chopped vegetables and cook for 15 minutes
Stir in soy sauce and lime juice
Add fresh basil leaves
Serve over jasmine rice

recipes.name: Couscous Salad
recipes.description: Light Mediterranean salad with couscous
instructions: Pour boiling water over couscous, cover for 5 minutes
Fluff couscous with a fork and let cool
Dice cucumber and halve cherry tomatoes
Finely chop red onion, parsley, and mint
Mix all vegetables with cooled couscous
Whisk lemon juice and olive oil together
Pour dressing over salad and toss
Serve at room temperature or chilled

recipes.name: Shakshuka
recipes.description: Middle Eastern eggs poached in tomato sauce
instructions: Sauté chopped onion and bell pepper until soft
Add minced garlic, cumin, and paprika, cook for 1 minute
Add chopped tomatoes and simmer for 10 minutes
Make wells in the sauce and crack eggs into them
Cover and cook for 5-7 minutes until eggs are set
Crumble feta on top
Garnish with fresh herbs
Serve with crusty bread

recipes.name: Pork Chops with Apples
recipes.description: Pan-seared pork chops with caramelized apples
instructions: Season pork chops with salt, pepper, and thyme
Heat oil in a large pan, sear pork chops for 4 minutes per side
Remove pork and set aside
In the same pan, melt butter and sauté sliced onions
Add sliced apples and cook until caramelized
Add chicken broth and simmer for 3 minutes
Return pork chops to pan and heat through
Serve with the apple and onion mixture on top

recipes.name: Avocado Toast
recipes.description: Simple breakfast toast with mashed avocado
instructions: Toast bread until golden
Mash avocados with lemon juice, salt, and pepper
Spread mashed avocado on toast
Top with halved cherry tomatoes
Sprinkle with red pepper flakes
Drizzle with olive oil
Serve immediately

recipes.name: Spinach and Ricotta Cannelloni
recipes.description: Baked pasta tubes filled with cheese and spinach
instructions: Cook spinach until wilted, squeeze out excess water
Mix spinach with ricotta, half the parmesan, nutmeg, and garlic
Fill cannelloni tubes with spinach mixture
Spread half the tomato sauce in a baking dish
Arrange filled cannelloni on top
Cover with remaining sauce
Top with mozzarella and remaining parmesan
Bake at 180°C for 35 minutes until golden

recipes.name: Korean Bibimbap
recipes.description: Mixed rice bowl with vegetables and egg
instructions: Cook rice according to package instructions
Marinate sliced beef in soy sauce and sesame oil
Blanch spinach, squeeze dry, season with sesame oil
Julienne and sauté carrot and zucchini separately
Cook beef until browned
Fry eggs sunny-side up
Divide rice into bowls, arrange vegetables and beef on top
Top each bowl with a fried egg and gochujang sauce
